title: I got banned..
body:
Um so I got BANNED permanently for doing nothing...
They told me to check my email for the message.
I didn't get any email
Why riott?????

replies.body: It looks like this account had some rather suspicious activity happening that could have been signs of a hacker. No worries, hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to sort this out after verifying that you're the original creator, then help you in making sure your account is safe and secure.
Thanks for the help Broporo, I got super spooked
